§9Drills§r are electric tools which come in different tiers. The §7LV§r Drill may not be too appealing, but higher-tier drills can mine 3x3x3, 5x5x5, and up to 9x9x9 to make huge holes!§r

This suggested drill is with a Diamond tip, which might be the best material for it right now.

You may hold off and make an §bMV§r drill §einstead§r. That one will be completely worth it.

§9Note 1:§r All Electric Tools have a lot more durability than indicated, as they use Energy to prevent damage from being applied! On top of that, they can be enchanted as Pickaxes can.

§9Note 2:§r Don't charge Drills while mining, as your item will be constantly updated and it will keep resetting the mining progress. 

§bLore:§r Up until GTCEu, Electric tools required Stainless Steel, which made them locked until almost HV age.
